description: Three more people on the island test positive for coronavirus, taking the Isle of Man's total to 29.
title: Coronavirus Isle of Man: All non-emergency construction work halted
title_page: Coronavirus Isle of Man: All non-emergency construction work halted - BBC News
maintext: At the Manx government's daily coronavirus briefing on Thursday, Mr Quayle said: "We know that this is a significant sector in our economy but we have also been advised that this is another area of activity that can increase the risk of the virus spreading."
